subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Why do entities lie?

Ok I got to chime in on that one and say it is one of the most profound and=
 funny things I have heard in a long time! 

Nicely done Frank 
=C2=A0"Natu=
re is showing us only the tail of the lion, but I have no doubt that the li=
on belongs to it even though, because of its large size, it cannot totally =
reveal itself all at once." 
-=E2=80=94 Albert Einstein 


"It is far bette=
r to grasp the universe as it really is than to persist in delusions, howev=
er satisfying and reassuring."
--Carl Sagan


"There is no such thing as an=
 insignificant detail. Don't just look 
for what you want to find."
-- Me L=
OL 




________________________________
From: Frank Sumption <purplealieng=
irl@...>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wed, December 9, 2009 7:16=
:22 PM
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Why do entities lie?

=C2=A0 
The good news i=
s--life is forever, and the bad news is--life is forever!

=C2=A0Frank-S


=
On Wed, Dec 9, 2009 at 3:43 PM, don powell <dpowell7299@ yahoo.com> wrote:
=

=C2=A0 
>
>
>I've always loved this end of the world stuff. =C2=A0The way =
I see it, if the world ends, I'm dead and I don't care. =C2=A0I could just =
as easily die tomorrow driving to work. =C2=A0So if there is something you =
should do while you are alive then do it. =C2=A0Otherwise who cares about w=
orlds ending?
>
>
>Don
>
>
>
________________________________
From: Frank S=
umption <purplealiengirl@ gmail.com> 
>
>To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
>Sent=
: Wed, December 9, 2009 3:24:46 PM
>Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Why do entities =
lie?
>
>
>=C2=A0 
>=C2=A0I've been doing "box" work for almost ten years, a=
nd I still get to the decepticons( liars). Perhaps it's just a level out th=
ere, as I think there is an inifinite number of levels and/or demensions. M=
aybe there is a demonic level? I have a group that communicates, and they u=
sually tell "this is an apple", a metaphor for a truth. Not all of these vo=
ices are spirit per se`, some have never been human,=C2=A0there is a group =
out there called the fish group, a group of entities that exist off planet =
and really enjoy screwing with EVPers. =C2=A0I think it was the people-I fo=
rget their names, experimenting in Luxemberg quite some time ago that first=
 got the Fish Group. 
>
>=C2=A0For me, I don't really care what comes throu=
gh, it's the fact that something talks that shouldn't be there, my approach=
 hasd always been on the technical side. 
>
>=C2=A0I get some mediumistic c=
ontacts/visions, and I have some spirits that seemingly prefer telepathic c=
ontacts, but I don't take=C2=A0that as anymore gosple than anything else. M=
ost of the=C2=A0"communication" tends to be extremely trivial in nature. 
>=

>=C2=A0As far as end of the world stuff, I do get that, alot of it, in alm=
ost every session, they insist it's true, at least as far as end of the cyc=
le goes, but, and it's a big but, who knows what level/source that is from-=
-they claim not to be human. Plus we do have access to the future, if I do =
my meditation regularly I see almost everything ahead of time, plus I dream=
 it, and I know everyone on this planet. I would expect spirit to be much m=
ore aware, at least after they reach a higher state. Human is not the highe=
st level, so you can't compare everything to what y'all think you know. 
>
=
>=C2=A0Frank-S
>
>
>
>
>
>=C2=A0
>On Wed, Dec 9, 2009 at 11:47 AM, michelle=
wisbith <mwisbith@hotmail. com> wrote:
>
>=C2=A0 
>>
>>
>>Hello, all.
>>
>>=
My name is Michelle. I'm a certified medium with a Spiritualist church. Thi=
s was a two year process which involved proving I can communicate with spir=
its to a congregation (not bragging - just trying to explain my background =
and why I know what I do). I'm also one of the biggest skeptics you'll ever=
 meet (It was one of two reasons I became a medium. I wanted to see how the=
y were "faking" it. Surprise! They weren't). I'd like to contribute what I'=
ve learned about spirits. As Jill wrote, "I(t) really takes personal experi=
ence to believe this stuff exists".
>>
>>As to her main question of "Why do=
 spirits lie", I don't think we can always assume they're lying. If the inf=
ormation comes through a medium, one of the first items to address is wheth=
er or not the medium received the message correctly and then whether or not=
 he/she interepreted it correctly and phrased it in a way that allowed the =
recipient to understand the spirit's meaning. There are a variety of ways s=
pirits communicate with mediums; some are easier than others to understand =
and pass on. For the harder methods, it would be possible for a medium to i=
nadvertently misinterept the message based on his/her past experiences. 
>>=

>>When we look at the question from the connection to EVP's and ghost boxe=
s, we have to examine a few items. Was the spirit able to use the devices c=
orrectly to form the words he/she actually intended? This is a two step pro=
cess. It can be difficult for them to not only pull the available energy in=
to a useable form, but to also form the correct words (think it as a foreig=
ner learning English and saying "car" when they mean "star". They sound sim=
ilar, but have very different meanings). 
>>
>>Did we understand the words =
they said? It's fairly easy to get them wrong, especially in instances wher=
e you aren't the first person to listen to the recording and someone else s=
ays, "Here listen to this. I think they're saying (fill in the blank)". Our=
 brains are going to tell us (fill in the blank) simply because that though=
t is now prevalent. If we're the only person listening to the recordings, t=
he same mistake can be made. The only conclusive way is to use equipment th=
at can amplify and break down the recordings to make them clear enough to b=
e agreed upon by a number of people who don't know what conclusions the oth=
er listeners have drawn. 
>>
>>The idea of a spirit distorting the facts mu=
st also be considered. Not lying, per se, but rather getting the facts with=
in their reality confused. This is where you have the right to have the fac=
ts validated by the spirit. Ask them to prove it to you. They can tell you =
some corresponding items that back up their claims, direct you to old newsp=
aper stories or to a person they used to affiliate with or bring the valida=
tion into your focus (meaning the same thing comes into your life while you=
're driving/working/ at home/talking to someone/reading and etc.) at least =
three times. A spirit who is being truthful will not mind trying to make th=
is happen. 
>>
>>Once these have been considered and eliminated, then we sh=
ould be willing to entertain the idea the spirit may be a lower energy bein=
g (a bully/swindler/ con-man or woman/narcissist and etc) in their past lif=
e and this is the only way they know how to achieve what they want. And yes=
, those spirits do exist. "As in life, so in death", meaning our personalit=
ies don't change when our bodies die.
>>
>>Al, maybe he wasn't trying to pr=
ove anything. Is it possible the spirit voice didn't mean he WAS (typed lar=
ger for emphasis) Steve Tate, but rather wanted to talk ABOUT Steve Tate or=
 get a message TO Steve Tate? Did he mean to say "Still fate"? Could he hav=
e meant "paratrooper"? See where I'm going with this? 
>>
>>And finally, in=
 regards to the "end of the world stuff", it has been taught to me by mediu=
ms and teachers who were all very honest and excellent at what they do, and=
 it has been relayed to me by spirits I've encountered in my mediumship ser=
vice that we don't have a free glimpse of the future once our bodies die an=
d we move into spirit form. I mean no offense and I'm not impying that wasn=
't what was heard. That said (or rather 'typed'), I'd be VERY hesitant to b=
elieve this communication. There are beings that are privvy to the potentia=
l (underscore "potential") future in our lives, but it isn't their nature t=
o join us for EVP sessions. 
>>
>>I hope I haven't taken liberty with this =
forum by posting such a long reply. I thank you for your time and attention=
. If you have other questions or would like me to clarify something, please=
 ask. I'd be honored to share what I know and track down what I don't. :) 
=
>>
>>Michelle
>>
>>
>

ccess to the future, if I do my meditation regularly I see almost everythin=

<DIV class=3Dgmail_quote>On Wed, Dec 9, 2009 at 11:47 AM, michellewis=
bith <SPAN dir=3Dltr><<A href=3D"mailto:mwisbith@..." target=3D_=
blank rel=3Dnofollow ymailto=3D"mailto:mwisbith@...">mwisbith@hotma=
il. com</A>></SPAN> wrote:<BR>
<BLOCKQUOTE class=3Dgmail_quote style=3D"=
BORDER-LEFT: #ccc 1px solid">
<DIV style=3D"BACKGROUND-COLOR: #fff"><SPAN>&=
nbsp;</SPAN> 
<DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV>
<P><BR><BR>Hello, all.<BR><BR>My name is Mi=
chelle. I'm a certified medium with a Spiritualist church. This was a two y=
ear process which involved proving I can communicate with spirits to a cong=
regation (not bragging - just trying to explain my background and why I kno=
w what I do). I'm also one of the biggest skeptics you'll ever meet (It was=
 one of two reasons I became a medium. I wanted to see how they were "fakin=
g" it. Surprise! They weren't). I'd like to contribute what I've learned ab=
out spirits. As Jill wrote, "I(t) really takes personal experience to belie=
ve this stuff exists".<BR><BR>As to her main question of "Why do spirits li=
e", I don't think we can always assume they're lying. If the information co=
mes through a medium, one of the first items to address is whether or not t=
he medium received the message correctly and then whether or not he/she int=
erepreted it correctly and phrased it in a way that allowed the recipient t=
o understand the spirit's
 meaning. There are a variety of ways spirits com=
municate with mediums; some are easier than others to understand and pass o=
n. For the harder methods, it would be possible for a medium to inadvertent=
ly misinterept the message based on his/her past experiences. <BR><BR>When =
we look at the question from the connection to EVP's and ghost boxes, we ha=
ve to examine a few items. Was the spirit able to use the devices correctly=
 to form the words he/she actually intended? This is a two step process. It=
 can be difficult for them to not only pull the available energy into a use=
able form, but to also form the correct words (think it as a foreigner lear=
ning English and saying "car" when they mean "star". They sound similar, bu=
t have very different meanings). <BR><BR>Did we understand the words they s=
aid? It's fairly easy to get them wrong, especially in instances where you =
aren't the first person to listen to the recording and someone else says, "=
Here listen to
 this. I think they're saying (fill in the blank)". Our brai=
ns are going to tell us (fill in the blank) simply because that thought is =
now prevalent. If we're the only person listening to the recordings, the sa=
me mistake can be made. The only conclusive way is to use equipment that ca=
n amplify and break down the recordings to make them clear enough to be agr=
eed upon by a number of people who don't know what conclusions the other li=
steners have drawn. <BR><BR>The idea of a spirit distorting the facts must =
also be considered. Not lying, per se, but rather getting the facts within =
their reality confused. This is where you have the right to have the facts =
validated by the spirit. Ask them to prove it to you. They can tell you som=
e corresponding items that back up their claims, direct you to old newspape=
r stories or to a person they used to affiliate with or bring the validatio=
n into your focus (meaning the same thing comes into your life while you're=

 driving/working/ at home/talking to someone/reading and etc.) at least th=
ree times. A spirit who is being truthful will not mind trying to make this=
 happen. <BR><BR>Once these have been considered and eliminated, then we sh=
ould be willing to entertain the idea the spirit may be a lower energy bein=
g (a bully/swindler/ con-man or woman/narcissist and etc) in their past lif=
e and this is the only way they know how to achieve what they want. And yes=
, those spirits do exist. "As in life, so in death", meaning our personalit=
ies don't change when our bodies die.<BR><BR>Al, maybe he wasn't trying to =
prove anything. Is it possible the spirit voice didn't mean he WAS (typed l=
arger for emphasis) Steve Tate, but rather wanted to talk ABOUT Steve Tate =
or get a message TO Steve Tate? Did he mean to say "Still fate"? Could he h=
ave meant "paratrooper"? See where I'm going with this? <BR><BR>And finally=
, in regards to the "end of the world stuff", it has been taught to
 me by =
mediums and teachers who were all very honest and excellent at what they do=
, and it has been relayed to me by spirits I've encountered in my mediumshi=
p service that we don't have a free glimpse of the future once our bodies d=
ie and we move into spirit form. I mean no offense and I'm not impying that=
 wasn't what was heard. That said (or rather 'typed'), I'd be VERY hesitant=
 to believe this communication. There are beings that are privvy to the pot=
ential (underscore "potential") future in our lives, but it isn't their nat=
ure to join us for EVP sessions. <BR><BR>I hope I haven't taken liberty wit=
h this forum by posting such a long reply. I thank you for your time and at=
tention. If you have other questions or would like me to clarify something,=
 please ask. I'd be honored to share what I know and track down what I don'=
t. :) <BR><BR>Michelle<BR><BR></P></DIV>
